Gameshark Code - Updated Kidman Attire for WCW/nWo Revenge

This information is attributed to S.K. Stylez and was originally found here.

Here’s an updated attire for Kidman. It’s best to keep the jeans black, as changing the colour will change the kneepad colour as well.

– S.K. Stylez
